name: FAST DRAG
description:
A small race game made for the santajam !!!

This game is a prototype.

CONTROLS:
  • Use the mouse to navigate on the map.
  • [W] to accelerate [A] left and [D] right, [S] to brake, [SPACE] to use NOS.
  • [M] to mute the sound.
  • [R] to restart the game.
  • [Escape] to toggle fullscreen.
  • [V] in race to change the view.
CREDITS :
  • 3D model made by my own.
  • Code by my own.
  • Some art and picture is from pixabay and others has been created or modified by me.
